channel.title: Eklipse Server -- [RS ACCOUNT PHISHER, READ IF DOWNLOADED]
channel.description:
Eklipse Server!
Downloads
*
Few Main Boss's King Black Dragon Toktz Jad Bandos General Chaos Ele
Combat The Combat system will provide the most fun PVP time ever.
Anti-cheats Blocks many cheats from cheat clients.
Skills Skilling isn't much of a main factor in the sever as PvP but its still implented into the game with all skills working, Their not all 100% like other servers claim to have but there basic for what you need to make cash and have fun.
Customs A few custom items such as PvP Armour, Dragon Claws, Skillcapes, Avas Accumulator, Void, and the Armadyl Godsword
Here are the pictures! :)
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/288auee.png[/img]
[img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/bgs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/ags.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/explock.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/dclaws.jpg[/img]

@deathschaos9 wrote:

Eklipse Server!

Downloads

Few Main Boss’s
King Black Dragon
Toktz Jad

Chaos Ele

The Combat system will provide the most fun PVP time ever.

Skilling isn’t much of a main factor in the sever as PvP but its still implented into the game with all skills working,
Their not all 100% like other servers claim to have but there basic for what you need to make cash and have fun.
